Command.name: \echo
Command.Description: Displays a line of text.

Command.name: \session
Command.Description: Displays set of sessions or switches to another session.

Command.name: \quit
Command.Description: Exits jsqsh

Command.name: \history
Command.Description: Displays a history of SQL statements executed

Command.name: \connect
Command.Description: Establishes a connection to a database.

Command.name: \go
Command.Description: Executes the contents of the current buffer

Command.name: \reset
Command.Description: Clears the current SQL buffer of its contents.

Command.name: \set
Command.Description: Sets a variable or displays all variables.

Command.name: \unset
Command.Description: Removes a jsqsh variable.

Command.name: \help
Command.Description: Displays help for a jsqsh command

Command.name: \wrap
Command.Description: Used internally for testing of jsqsh's word-wrapping facility.

Command.name: \buf-copy
Command.Description: Copies the contents of one SQL buffer into another

Command.name: \buf-append
Command.Description: Appends the contents of one SQL buffer into another

Command.name: \buf-edit
Command.Description: Edits a SQL buffer

Command.name: \alias
Command.Description: Creates an alias

Command.name: \end
Command.Description: Ends the current session

Command.name: \buf-load
Command.Description: Loads an external file into a SQL buffer

Command.name: \tables
Command.Description: Displays tables, views, synonyms, etc.

Command.name: \procs
Command.Description: Displays stored procedures

Command.name: \databases
Command.Description: Displays set of available databases (catalogs)

Command.name: \describe
Command.Description: Displays a description of a database object

Command.name: \macro
Command.Description: Creates a velocimacro from the current buffer

Command.name: \eval
Command.Description: Read and execute an input file full of SQL

Command.name: \parse
Command.Description: (Internal) Used to test SQL parsing

Command.name: \debug
Command.Description: Used to enable debugging

Command.Description: Compares results from multiple sessions

Command.Description: Lists available JDBC driver definitions

Command.Description: Generates INSERT statements from a query

Command.Description: Generates a SELECT using table definitions

Command.Description: Generates a CREATE TABLE using table definitions

Command.name: \call
Command.Description: Call a prepared statement

Command.name: \tree
Command.Description: Shows a tree view of all the tables

Command.name: \globals
Command.Description: Displays all global variables

Command.name: \show
Command.Description: Show various database metadata

Command.name: \prepare
Command.Description: Display prepared query metadata

Command.name: \stack
Command.Description: Display the stack trace of the most recently displayed error message

Command.name: \setup
Command.Description: Simple guided setup for managing named connections

Command.name: \md
Command.Description: Test jsqsh's markdown rendering

Command.name: \wiki
Command.Description: Generate jsqsh documentation for the wiki

Command.name: \import
Command.Description: Imports command packages into jsqsh

Command.Description: Reads input from user into variables
